metadata.name: Imagine this prompt /...
metadata.description:
a dad who has no legs, wearing sun glasses, 
a mum next to her daugher, and prouds of
her daugherâ€™s beauty, an old man giving
a candy to the girl, red abstract backround
As artists, we have an infinite imagination to create a concept, regardless of our medium (whether it be AI, ready-made objects, typography, traditional art,etc.) 
As a limited member of an AI program, I paid $10 to use it, but the program did not fully understand the prompt I gave in the first attempt. If I had continued to use AI, I would have had to find the right words to get it to understand the concept in my creative mind.
As an artist who primarily uses traditional methods, I used a method that blends traditional and digital media. More easy :)
Although many people say that AI is easy, for me, being able to produce what I have designed in my mind with AI is currently more difficult.
I have great respect for the artists who can realize what they imagine in their creative minds through artificial intelligence.
